name: Grassroots
description: Minimal, earthy lawn care template with natural green accent for eco-friendly businesses

content_slots.about_text: We believe in nurturing your lawn with organic methods and earth-friendly practices. Beautiful results, naturally.

values.name: Locally Owned
values.description: Family-run business serving our community since 2008.

values.name: Eco-Friendly
values.description: All-natural fertilizers and sustainable lawn care methods.

values.name: Reliable Service
values.description: Show up on time, every time. That's our promise.

process.title: Free Consultation
process.description: We walk your property and assess your lawn's unique needs.

process.title: Custom Plan
process.description: A tailored care plan using organic, earth-friendly products.

process.title: Beautiful Results
process.description: Sit back and enjoy a lush, healthy lawn you can be proud of.
